channel.title: A bit of forgetfulness - How do I set where Home is?
channel.description:
I forgot how to, but then again, I only figured it out overnight before I went to bed ^^"..
I tried searching, to no avail.
Basically, I'm using allstarscapev2 source, and am trying to set the home to somewhere that isn't the mountain base. I can get the coords, I just need to know what codes I need and where to place them.
Thanks to anyone's help. :rolleyes:

item.title: A bit of forgetfulness - How do I set where Home is?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:3, topic:295930”]Player.java

Search for “initial”, should come up with like “initial x and y coordinates of the player”

just change those.[/quote]

Thanks. It worked.

Read full topic
item.source: A bit of forgetfulness - How do I set where Home is?

item.title: A bit of forgetfulness - How do I set where Home is?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Saurus Owner Saurus
item.description:
@Owner_Saurus wrote:

[code][code]Find the file named player.java then you go in it and search:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player[/code]
then you should see something a few lines down that look like:

telporttoX:
teleporttoY:

then a few numbers like 4 character numbers then ;// more numbers make them the same on the same line for the Xs and Ys but don’t keep the x on the y line keep the x on the teleporttoX line and the Y on its[/code]

Read full topic

just change those.

item.title: A bit of forgetfulness - How do I set where Home is?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

It might be in your player class? Other than that, go the spot where you start, get the co’ords and go into client.java and search them.

Read full topic
